data.name: Undercraft
data.detailed_description:
Undercraft is a sandbox game set in a procedurally generated world. Have different experiences every time you play the game. Explore this vast world alone or with friends.

Day and Night
Find different types of enemies day and night. Be careful some enemies become more dangerous on certain nights.

Caves
Found caves on the map and collect rare resources to craft.

Explore the vast world
Explore the world, cut trees, find resources.

Create your world procedural
Discover new lands, places, explore different types of biomes with different types of animals and different items in them.

Build Something Big
Create buildings, decorate inside or outside your house with everything you want.
You can even destroy the houses of other players you found on the map.

data.short_description: Create your world in this sandbox game where you can dig, build, climb, explore, fight, and farm. Have a different experience in a day or night adventure. Explore a procedurally generated world alone or with friends.
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K 3.3GHz Or AMD FX-8320
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 950 2 GB/ AMD Radeon R9 380
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 11 GB available space
